title: League is a free to play game. Sike.
body:
Wanna buy a new champ 6.3k ip. You get about 65 per win. Good luck.

New champ. Wanna buy it and don't have RP?7.8k. Better start saving as soon as you hear about it's release. 

Don't even bother with rune pages, just use 2. Or you're looking at 30-50 extra bucks right there.

Good luck.

You'll need it.
